definition: and even/to go so far as to

sentences.english: This almost-falling into chaos keeps life proliferating.
sentences.chinese: 這種幾近墜落乃至混沌的運行狀態確保了生命的增殖。

sentences.english: The beauty of JiuZhaigou attracts tourists from the Europe and far afield.
sentences.chinese: 九寨溝的美景吸引了來自歐洲乃至更遠方的遊客。

sentences.english: The same is true in the West Bank and the Islamic world.
sentences.chinese: 約旦河西岸地區乃至整個伊斯蘭世界也是如此。

sentences.english: La Rioja is perhaps one of the most remarkable and reputable denominations of origin in Spain and perhaps the world.
sentences.chinese: 里奧哈是西班牙乃至世界上最知名的葡萄酒產區之一。

sentences.english: I will be here next year and the year after that and after that and after that.
sentences.chinese: 明年和後年乃至未來，我均會到這裏來。

sentences.english: It can even cause disharmony in a family.
Sancbuan as a shire was once setup in the States of Han and Qin during the Warring States Period and later the Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 韓國和秦國乃至後來建立的秦潮都曾設置過三川郡。

sentences.english: She'd want to know how doctors ended up curing cancer and senility.
sentences.chinese: 醫生有否實現對癌症乃至衰老的控制。

sentences.english: Hong Kong is considered as one of the most energic districts of development in Asia, even all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 香港被公認爲亞州乃至全球最具發展活力的地區之一。

sentences.english: Respect and treasure your differences. Learn from one another.
sentences.chinese: 尊重乃至珍惜你們的不同點，向對方學習。

sentences.english: Anti-corruption campaign is a major political issue in China, even in the world.
sentences.chinese: 反腐倡廉是中國乃至世界的一項重大政治課題。

sentences.english: Today, Professor Kao's reputation extends way beyond that of professor or even vice-chancellor.
sentences.chinese: 今天，高教授的聲名遠超他作爲教授乃至校長的頭銜。

sentences.english: Now, TCN is a popular train network standard in China and even around the world.
sentences.chinese: 是當前我國乃至全世界採用的列車網絡標準。

sentences.english: Structural changes are taking place in Germanys Ruhrgebiet.
sentences.chinese: 魯爾區是德國乃至世界最重要的工業區之一。

sentences.english: And don't know where it is melted, or twinkling rising moon.
sentences.chinese: 乃至分不清它到底是熔日，亦或熒熒初升的皓月了。

sentences.english: It is extending its trade tentacles into Africa and Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 它正在把貿易觸手延及非洲，乃至拉美。

definition: to cover the whole (area)/to be found throughout
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
(used for abstract things) a good deal, a lot of
